column4: Market-wise Wholesale Prices Monthly Analysis (All Districts) for Wheat in Maharashtra - June, 2022

column1: Weighted Average Price = ∑(arrival quantity * modal price) / ∑arrival quantity
Change (Over Previous Month) = [Price - Price(Over Previous Month)/Price(Over Previous Month)] * 100
Change (Over Previous Year) = [Price - Price(Over Previous Year)/Price(Over Previous Year)] * 100
